mapper.update: UPDATE J_참여자관리 SET 취업역량 = #{counselJobSkill}, 최근상담일 = CONVERT(date, #{counselLastCons}, 120), 진행단계 = #{counselProgress}, 초기상담일 = CONVERT(date, #{counselInItCons}, 120), 구직만료일 = CONVERT(date, #{counselJobEX}, 120), IAP수료일 = CONVERT(date, #{counselIAPDate}, 120), [3단계진입일] = CONVERT(date, #{counselStepPro}, 120), 기간만료일 = CONVERT(date, #{counselEXPDate}, 120), 클리닉실시일 = CONVERT(date, #{counselClinic}, 120), IAP3개월일자 = CONVERT(date, #{counselIAP3Month}, 120), IAP5개월일자 = CONVERT(date, #{counselIAP5Month}, 120), 수당지급일 = CONVERT(date, #{counselAllowancePayment}, 120), 희망직무 = #{counselJobWant}, 희망급여 = #{counselSalWant}, 알선요청 = #{counselPlacement}, 간접고용서비스 = #{counselEmploymentService} WHERE 구직번호 = #{counselJobNo}
mapper.select: SELECT A.구직번호 AS counselJobNo, A.참여자 AS counselPartic, A.취업역량 AS counselJobSkill, CASE WHEN A.최근상담일 >= DATEADD(YEAR, -100, GETDATE()) THEN A.최근상담일 END AS counselLastCons, A.진행단계 AS counselProgress, CASE WHEN A.초기상담일 >= DATEADD(YEAR, -100, GETDATE()) THEN A.초기상담일 END AS counselInItCons, CASE WHEN A.구직만료일 >= DATEADD(YEAR, -100, GETDATE()) THEN A.구직만료일 END AS counselJobEX, CASE WHEN A.IAP수료일 >= DATEADD(YEAR, -100, GETDATE()) THEN A.IAP수료일 END AS counselIAPDate, CASE WHEN A.[3단계진입일] >= DATEADD(YEAR, -100, GETDATE()) THEN A.[3단계진입일] END AS counselStepPro, CASE WHEN A.기간만료일 >= DATEADD(YEAR, -100, GETDATE()) THEN A.기간만료일 END AS counselEXPDate, CASE WHEN A.클리닉실시일 >= DATEADD(YEAR, -100, GETDATE()) THEN A.클리닉실시일 END AS counselClinic, CASE WHEN A.IAP3개월일자 >= DATEADD(YEAR, -100, GETDATE()) THEN A.IAP3개월일자 END AS counselIAP3Month, CASE WHEN A.IAP5개월일자 >= DATEADD(YEAR, -100, GETDATE()) THEN A.IAP5개월일자 END AS counselIAP5Month, CASE WHEN A.수당지급일 >= DATEADD(YEAR, -100, GETDATE()) THEN A.수당지급일 END AS counselAllowancePayment, A.희망직무 AS counselJobWant, A.희망급여 AS counselSalWant, A.알선요청 AS counselPlacement, A.간접고용서비스 AS counselEmploymentService, B.상세정보 AS placementDetail FROM J_참여자관리 A JOIN J_참여자관리_알선상세정보 B ON A.구직번호 = B.구직번호 WHERE A.구직번호=#{counselJobNo}
SELECT 구직번호 AS counselJobNo, 진행단계 AS counselProgress FROM J_참여자관리 WHERE 구직번호=#{counselJobNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE J_참여자관리_알선상세정보 SET 상세정보 = #{placementDetail}, 수정일 = GETDATE() WHERE 구직번호 = #{counselJobNo}
